attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage of all workers 18 and over to a living wage of £10/hour
attributes.background: The need to raise the minimum wage to at least £10 per hour is crucial in the battle against poverty and the fight for a redistribution of the wealth. The future of the middle class and the opportunity of rewarding hard work with acceptable pay requires a national living wage to everyone 18 and over

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558514
